import React, { useState } from 'react'; import HealthInsuranceCard from './HealthInsuranceCard'; import LifeInsuranceCard from './LifeInsuranceCard'; import CyberInsuranceCard from './CyberInsuranceCard'; import HomeInsuranceCard from './HomeInsuranceCard'; import MotorInsuranceCard from './MotorInsuranceCard'; import TravelInsuranceCard from './TravelInsuranceCard'; const Hero: React.FC = () => { const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false); const [activeCard, setActiveCard] = useState<'health' | 'life' | 'motor' | 'travel' | 'cyber' | 'home' | null>(null); const handleBookSafetyCall = (cardType: 'health' | 'life' | 'motor' | 'travel' | 'cyber' | 'home') => { setActiveCard(cardType); setShowForm(true); }; const handleCloseForm = () => { setShowForm(false); setActiveCard(null); }; // Function to render form fields based on card type const renderFormFields = () => { switch (activeCard) { case 'health': case 'life': return ( <> {/* Name */}
{/* Phone No. */}
{/* Age */}
{/* Dependents */}
{/* Target sum insured */}
); case 'motor': return ( <> {/* Name */}
{/* Phone No. */}
{/* Registration No */}
{/* Policy expiry */}
{/* Make */}
{/* Model */}
); case 'travel': return ( <> {/* Name */}
{/* Phone No. */}
{/* Destination country / region */}
{/* Trip start & end dates */}
{/* Number of passengers */}
); case 'cyber': return ( <> {/* Name */}
{/* Phone No. */}
{/* Coverage needed */}
{/* Any prior breaches or claims history */}
); case 'home': return ( <> {/* Name */}
{/* Phone No. */}
{/* Cost of structure and interiors */}
{/* Desired policy term */}
); default: return null; } }; return (
{/* Left Content - Exact positioning from Figma */}
{/* Main Headline */}

Insurance
Minus the
Drama

{/* Subtitle */}

No drama, just coverage that works when life doesn't.

{/* Description */}

IRDAI-approved coverage. Built in Bangalore, trusted nationwide since 2018

{/* CTA Button */}
{/* Right Product Grid - Moved further right and slightly bigger */}
{/* Health Insurance Card - Using the new component */}
handleBookSafetyCall('health')} />
{/* Life Insurance Card - Using the new component */}
handleBookSafetyCall('life')} />
{/* Travel Insurance Card - Using the new component */}
handleBookSafetyCall('travel')} />
{/* Motor Insurance Card - Using the new component */}
handleBookSafetyCall('motor')} />
{/* Home Insurance Card - Using the new component */}
handleBookSafetyCall('home')} />
{/* Cyber Insurance Card - Using the new component */}
handleBookSafetyCall('cyber')} />
{/* Cards Section Form Overlay */} {showForm && (
{/* Form Header */}

{activeCard === 'health' ? 'Health' : activeCard === 'life' ? 'Life' : activeCard === 'motor' ? 'Motor' : activeCard === 'travel' ? 'Travel' : activeCard === 'cyber' ? 'Cyber' : 'Home'}

{/* Form Content - Scrollable */}
{/* Form Fields */}
{renderFormFields()}
{/* Form Buttons - Fixed at bottom */}
)}
); }; export default Hero;
